Class Wall

java.lang.Object
com.tron_master.tron.model.object.GameObject
com.tron_master.tron.model.object.Wall
Direct Known Subclasses:
Portal
public class Wall extends GameObject
Represents a static wall (obstacle) in the game area. Players collide with walls and die upon contact. Extends GameObject for consistent collision detection.

      public Wall(int x, int y, int width, int height, ColorValue color)
      Constructs a static wall at the specified position and size.
      Parameters:
      x - Top-left x coordinate
      y - Top-left y coordinate
      width - Wall width in pixels
      height - Wall height in pixels
      color - Wall color for rendering
